titleStmt.title: Contemplations vpon the principal passages of the holy story. The second volume; in foure books. By I. Hall, Dr. of Diuinity
Contemplations upon the principall passages of the Holy Storie. Vol. 2
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

titleStmt.title: Contemplations vpon the principal passages of the holy story. The second volume; in foure books. By I. Hall, Dr. of Diuinity
Contemplations upon the principall passages of the Holy Storie. Vol. 2
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. L[ownes] for S. Macha[m], & are to be sold in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Bul-head,

notesStmt.note: The first two leaves are blank except for signature-mark "A" or "A2" with marginal rules; the last two leaves are blank except for marginal rules.
Books 5-8; books 6-8 each have separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
